attributes.contentHtml:
It's so sad how these idiots still run a network after raiding 2 discord servers. and giving people ranks on their servers and blackmailing people smh + they use a cracked Potpvp plugin and decompiled it and weren't able to recompile ðŸ¤£ , Even the other old owner was exposed on black spigot (Schaefer) https://blackspigot.com/downloads/downfall-of-schaefer-part-1-premades.20233/ + the still continue to use cracked plugins on pebblehost







The Funny Thing is was a previous owner, got removed for bullshit, random reason. by another owner by the name of crent also a moderator @ColdPVP And a Media Rank, the only reason he was added as an owner was that he claimed to get famous people into the server which is bullshit and was not what I wanted to do but the main owner wanted him to be an owner, after ragging on a children's game decided to delete the server files, blame it on me then get rid of my roles (Had Ownership at the time on discord) and added the owner of galactic nodes as a dev.

Who is Racist, Ableist, Skateboarding's the Owner of also Raided Doxa Network One Of My Servers, Recently Attempted to raid us thru the panel thru a corrupt dev opping himself ingame, after we ban him unbanning himself thru console

I kept banning him and proof of that is his UUID and his IP that I censored out but I do not have any more screenshots of him attempting to raid

If anyone doesn't believe anything in this post I can prove it very easily just contact me on discord.

Spoony#0429

Thank you!
